post_text: Hello! My name is Peter Flaherty, aka Mr. F., and I'm thrilled to be joining the Glover Community School faculty as the new fourth grade teacher. I grew up in South Portland, Maine, and I graduated from Colby College and Antioch New England Graduate School. I have been teaching for 30 years, working in everything from a huge inner city school in Minneapolis, to a one room schoolhouse in Granville, Vermont, and nearly everything in between. My wife, Ronda, and I raised our three children in Randolph, Vermont before moving to Plainfield last summer. When I'm not teaching I enjoy being outdoors, playing disc golf, motorcycling, music, and gardening. I can't wait to meet my new students and to become better acquainted with the Glover community!
